basics.name: Alex Feghhi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer/Data Scientist specializing in web development, data engineering, data analysis, and artificial intelligence.

work.name: Jumbula
highlights: Worked on front-end web development for the company website redesign
Helped create a cross platform application with Flutter
Presented business analytics data to shareholders

work.name: NASA Advanced Supercomputing (NAS) Division
work.summary: Research Assistant writing Python data processing code for a machine learning project predicting sunspot emergence
highlights: Wrote scripts to query JSOC solar data and handle API errors and missing files
Sped up output data generation by a factor of approximately 256
Allowed customized data generation with options for size, time interval, rendering method and more
Used pytorch CNNS and CGANs for image-to-image and image-to-scalar prediction

volunteer.summary: Data Analyst for a Cognitive Science Lab investigating the minimal processing unit of speech
highlights: Managed a data pipeline transforming raw videos to clips of openface output
Developed an unsupervised learning algorithm with 95% accuracy for speech onset and offset detection

volunteer.organization: Cognitive and Computational Neuroscience at UCSC
volunteer.summary: Research Assistant for a Computational Neuroscience Lab studying perception and consciousness with EEG as the primary experimental method
highlights: Ran participants for EEG & behavioral studies
Used MATLAB for data visualization and analysis

projects.name: A Computational Approach to Social Psychology
projects.summary: Presented an individual research project to a research symposium that used computational modeling to analyze the growth of ideas within a community.
